
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18677652" title="发布于 2025-01-17 20:55">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">C#数据结构与算法入门实战指南</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250117205308380-1914566425.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">前言</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在编程领域，数据结构与算法是构建高效、可靠和可扩展软件系统的基石。它们对于提升程序性能、优化资源利用以及解决复杂问题具有至关重要的作用。今天大姚分享一些非常不错的C#数据结构与算法实战教程，希望可以帮助到有需要的小伙伴。</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">C#经典十大排序算法</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">主要讲解C#经典十大排序算法的实现，部分包含图解！</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-2" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247490164&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=0a76d81c61eaab09808d108f0412438f&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#冒泡排序算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247489782&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=2345030c69184fcb2584b10dafd11b6d&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#选择排序算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247490843&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=99446b40894d76efb4f74b340a18f9c7&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#插入排序算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247491273&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=8dff3d7c6b51b97da149d38948647e69&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#希尔排序算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247492415&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=8afedbad0a9f8f91159668d0c86ba1fb&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#归并排序算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247490616&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=f486aa8a8346cb0927494f119b2805e0&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#快速排序算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247492439&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=71a7a6696262fc5f259ee9c5d96f6a0e&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#堆排序算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247492623&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=a199d90980e656ca83298f3c2bf34a91&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#计数排序算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247492660&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=0247ff29654f3509621c8b75cbd85c11&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#桶排序算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247492672&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=e6aa34314ee4b4384aef26c60751b0b3&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#基数排序算法</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">C#经典查找算法</h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247506067&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=9fbcd59546901e361018b1295f4533d9&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#二分查找算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247506400&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=86b6d62d8a5e5dd7d471c9fed09f4ec7&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#线性查找算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247504335&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=1858eca8bbdcedfab5f79afaf97f3a23&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#二叉搜索树算法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247506313&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=0fcb28a20a4289e367d6e93f9fb864d2&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#哈希查找算法</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Hello算法</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Hello算法一个开源免费、新手友好的数据结构与算法入门教程。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>全书采用动画图解，内容清晰易懂、学习曲线平滑，引导初学者探索数据结构与算法的知识地图。</li>
<li>源代码可一键运行，帮助读者在练习中提升编程技能，了解算法工作原理和数据结构底层实现。</li>
<li>支持 Python、C++、Java、C#、Go、<span>Swift、JavaScript、TypeScript、Dart、Rust、C 和 <span>Zig 等多语言。</span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250117205326183-1132037771.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/krahets/hello-algo" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/krahets/hello-algo</span></a></span></li>
<li>文章详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247493560&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=e988e6ad8b64dcc1ae4c27659aede0fe&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/9lb5iu6tGNiSGcIrf7fQ3A</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">TheAlgorithms/C-Sharp</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">一个C#实现的各种算法集合，这些算法涵盖了计算机科学、数学和统计学、数据科学、机器学习、工程等多个领域。这些实现及其相关文档旨在为教育工作者和学生提供学习资源。因此，可能会找到针对同一目标使用不同<span>算法策略和优化的多种实现。包含：排序算法、搜索算法、数值计算、数据结构、图算法等等。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/TheAlgorithms/C-Sharp" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/TheAlgorithms/C-Sharp</span></a></span></li>
<li>文章详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247501268&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=4104ce446f81db2c75ce2bd05ac5a26a&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/KRl7Zoe3Co42zbWGJitRbg</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">优秀项目和框架精选</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">以上项目都已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞）。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>GitHub开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
<li>Gitee开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250117205344909-1980624267.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
</div>
